names.pinyin: qing fei yi huo hua tan wan
names.english: clear the lungs, suppress fire and transform phlegm pill
names.commonEnglish: Clear the Lungs, Suppress Fire and Transform Phlegm Pill

actions: With Zhi Zi, powerfully clears and drains lurking Heat from the Lungs with fever, fullness in the chest, coughing with yellow sputum and epistaxis or hematemesis.
Clears Heat, reduces Fire and eliminates irritability in the San Jiao.
Clears Heat, transforms Phlegm, stops coughing and nourishes and moistens the Lungs.
Drains Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.
With Zhi Zi, resolves constraint and directs Qi downward for clearing Heat and Fire from the Liver channel.
Opens the Lungs, spreads Lung Qi, expels Phlegm and benefits the throat.
Expels Phlegm, descends Qi and expels Wind-Heat (most suitable when Wind-Heat constrains the Lungs).
Clears and drains Lung Heat, transforms Phlegm and moistens Lung Dryness.
Drains Fire, purges accumulations, invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and eliminates Phlegm.
With Huang Lian, for a feeling of fullness and distention due to Heat Accumulation.

symptoms: Thirst with a desire to drink
